text.english: Teorema: Identity of \(\texttt{add}\), i.e.  \[ \forall n \in \mathcal{N}Term . \; \texttt{add}(n, Z) = n \]
text.italiano: Teorema: Unit√† di \(\texttt{add}\), i.e. \[ \forall n \in \mathcal{N}Term . \; \texttt{add}(n, Z) = n \]

theorem.coq: Theorem add_zero: forall n : nterm , add n Z = n.
